publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-480 Richard Lochhead: Call for Inquiry into 118118 Directory Inquiry Service-That the Parliament notes with concern increasing reports of inaccurate numbers being given in response to inquiries made of the new 118118 directory inquiry service; calls upon Oftel to conduct an investigation into whether these providers are up to adequate standards and, if they are not, to take appropriate action, and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to ensure that the interests of Scottish consumers are safeguarded.

S2M-480 Richard Lochhead: Call for Inquiry into 118118 Directory Inquiry Serviceâ€”That the Parliament notes with concern increasing reports of inaccurate numbers being given in response to inquiries made of the new 118118 directory inquiry service; calls upon Oftel to conduct an investigation into whether these providers are up to adequate standards and, if they are not, to take appropriate action, and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to ensure that the interests of Scottish consumers are safeguarded. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S2M-480 Call for Inquiry into 118118 Directory Inquiry Service (lodged on 9 October 2003) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Jim Mather*, Brian Adam*, Alasdair Morgan*, Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*, John Swinburne*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-480 Call for Inquiry into 118118 Directory Inquiry Service (lodged on 9 October 2003) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-480 Call for Inquiry into 118118 Directory Inquiry Service (lodged on 9 October 2003) Mr Rob Gibson*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-480 Call for Inquiry into 118118 Directory Inquiry Service (lodged on 9 October 2003) Roseanna Cunningham*
